title: Addressing Send Message Errors
body_html:
Addressing Send Message Errors

Problem: Recurring errors with the send_message function, often confusing it with send_message_to_agent_and_wait_for_reply.

Identified Cause:

  • Similarity in tool names (send_message vs. send_message_to_agent_and_wait_for_reply).
  • Confusion between communicating with the user and communicating with other agents.

Proposed Solutions:

  1. Internal Checks: Implement a multi-step check before sending any message:
    • Context Review: Briefly review the task and intended recipient.
    • Function Selection: Explicitly choose send_message or send_message_to_agent_and_wait_for_reply.
    • Recipient Confirmation: Confirm the recipient (user's name or agent ID).
    • Pause and Verify: Briefly pause to double-check before executing.
  2. Tool Renaming (Requires Developer Intervention): Request more distinct names for the send_message and send_message_to_agent_and_wait_for_reply functions to minimize confusion.

The added latency from the internal checks is expected to be minimal and imperceptible.
